title: Wendy Wu launches new website
text:
Wendy Wu launches new website 11 August 2015 Save 
Wendy Wu Tours has launched a new website designed to make agents’ lives easier while giving customers more information. 
Michelle Laverick, head of global e-commerce, said the new wendywutours.co.uk is both tablet and mobile friendly as customers increasingly use the devices. 
Agents will be able to access required information quicker to speed up sales while feefo customer reviews, which have seen the operator score a 99% customer service and tour rating from more than 1,000 reviews, are fully integrated into the site. 
Staff are also well showcased in the new site, allowing them to discuss their favourite destinations and give tips and advice. 
Tour lay outs have also been improved to give more information on itineraries, dates and prices. 
Laverick said: “We’ve been listening to our customers and our trade partners over the last few months about how we could improve our website. 
“We’ve been reviewing the usability, across all devices, and the content available, with the aim to help the user select the right tour - from over 170 tours available. 
“We know touring in Asia is an amazing experience – and we wanted to make sure our website did Asia and the Wendy Wu touring experience justice. 
“In addition we will have an XML feed enabling our key trade partners easy access to the tour content to help agents sell Wendy Wu tours more easily. 
“This is just phase one with more exciting developments coming over the coming weeks and months.”
